required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Oral Bio Availability of Veliparib in Subjects With Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Oral Bioavailability of Veliparib Extended Release Formulations in Subjects With Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is a 3 part phase 1 study to evaluate the safety, pharmacokinetic and oral bioavailability of veliparib in subjects with solid tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Part 2 - Dose Escalation Cohort: Pharmacokinetic testing
primary_outcome.description: Cmax, Tmax ,and AUC, and safety parameters
The following pharmacokinetic parameters will be analyzed: Tmax, the terminal phase elimination rate constant (β), the natural logarithms of Cmax, AUCt and AUC∞.

primary_outcome.measure: Part 3 - Safety Expanded Cohort: Number of subjects with adverse events
Part 3 - Safety Expanded Cohort: Vital signs
Part 3 - Safety Expanded Cohort: Laboratory tests

secondary_outcome.measure: The number of participants with adverse events who receive the extended release formulations of veliparib.

results_reference.citation: Mittapalli RK, Nuthalapati S, Delke DeBord AE, Xiong H. Development of a Level A in Vitro-in Vivo Correlation for Veliparib (ABT-888) Extended Release Tablet Formulation. Pharm Res. 2017 Jun;34(6):1187-1192. doi: 10.1007/s11095-017-2133-3. Epub 2017 Feb 27.
